content.question: According to the sentence, which of the following statements is true?

choices.label: Caelius is very happy to see Musonius.
Musonius is very happy to see Caelius.
Caelius thinks Musonius is very happy.
Musonius thinks Caelius is very happy.

content.answer: Caelius thinks Musonius is very happy.

unit.text: 2: Pliny's Letters: Eruption of Mt. Vesuvius
